app_description.message: Return Twitter's legacy verification and change the verification badge for users with a Twitter Blue subscription.

revoke_verified.message: Remove verified badges from users who are now subscribers to Twitter Blue.

alert_config_saved.message: To see the changes, it is necessary to refresh the page.

alert_saved_failed.message: Something went wrong. Please Refresh the Page.

alert_stay_on_twitter.message: This extension only works on Twitter. If you are on Twitter, you might need to refresh the page.
